goal.ch: 修讀完本學期，學生應能達到以下的華語文能力：1. 閱讀五百字左右的短篇文章，以中文流利陳述文章重點，並針對文章主題發表個人看法；2. 完成300字以上的中文寫作，清楚表達個人觀點與看法。
goal.en: After completing this course, students should be able to reach the following requirement of Chinese fluence on reading and writing. First, read an 500-word article, summarize the article orally with fluent Chinese and propose his/her viewpoints. Second, write a 300-word article with clear expression of his/her viewpoints.
